name: Never Alone: Arctic Collection
description:
Experience the epic journey of Nuna and Fox as they search for the source of an eternal blizzard that threatens the survival of everything they have ever known.

Never Alone is an atmospheric puzzle platformer developed in collaboration with the IÃ±upiat, an Alaska Native people, drawn from a traditional story that has been shared across the generations. 

The Arctic Collection includes the original game; the 'Never Alone: Foxtales' DLC featuring a new story and three additional levels; and the game's original soundtrack.
